pli-tv-pvr21:4.3: [Sp.5.485](): _Akāle vā sāvetīti sāvanāya akāle anokāse ñattiṃ aṭṭhapetvā paṭhamaṃyeva anussāvanakammaṃ katvā pacchā ñattiṃ ṭhapeti._, “_Akāle vā sāveti_: at the wrong time for the announcement, on the wrong occasion, without doing the motion, they first do the announcement and then do the motion afterwards.”
